meanings.sent1: The surgeon nephrectomized the patient to treat the kidney disease.
meanings.sent2: The doctor will nephrectomize the kidney to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: After the surgery, the nephrectomized kidney was carefully examined.
meanings.sent4: The decision to nephrectomize the damaged kidney was a difficult one.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the nephrectomized kidney being removed echoed in the operating room.

meanings.definition: Having had a kidney surgically removed.
meanings.sent1: The nephrectomized patient required special care post-surgery.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved after becoming nephrectomized and free from pain.
meanings.sent3: The nephrectomized kidney seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: His nephrectomized state made him appreciate life more.
meanings.sent5: The nephrectomized area was carefully monitored for any signs of complications.
